title: Wired mouse causing lag
body:
For a month or so now whenever I move my mouse around (or click to move, attack etc) it lags the game super hard. I switch over to a cheap little wireless mouse and no lag. Mouse is brand new. I’ve tried resetting mouse confit in league settings and uninstall/reinstall the game.
Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: Is that any kind of gaming mouse that might have additional software involved like Razr Synapse? If so the program in the background might be the issue. Try using the wired mouse without other background programs running (a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3) can help with this) and let me know if you still see that odd lag.
There is no software associated with the mouse (it’s a redragon mammoth gaming mouse). And the other mouse was an octane gaming mouse. Tried the clean boot and still lags

Hmmmmm I'm really curious what might be causing this, but I think it might be a little over this poro's technical knowledge. Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your game logs so that they can take a much closer look and get to the bottom of this!
